segments.text: Yes ma'am , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is room eleven-seven and we have just checked in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our room hasn't been cleaned up yet.So would you send one of your housekeepers to clean up our room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , ma'am . We'll come right away then.Your room number and your name , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our room number is eleven-seven and my name is Terry Chen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.Would you hang up and wait ?
segments.speaker: S2
